thread.title: Barcelona star buys house near Stamford Bridge after meeting Chelsea star Diego Costa
thread.title_full: Barcelona star buys house near Stamford Bridge after meeting Chelsea star Diego Costa

title: Barcelona star buys house near Stamford Bridge after meeting Chelsea star Diego Costa

organizations.name: diego costa premier league championship scottish premiership barcelona

text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Barcelona ace buys house near Stamford Bridge after meeting Chelsea star Diego Costa ARDA TURAN has reportedly bought a house in London - potentially hinting he is eyeing a move to Chelsea. PUBLISHED: 00:01, Sat, Feb 18, 2017 | UPDATED: 00:22, Sat, Feb 18, 2017 The Barcelona star has been linked with a move away from the Nou Camp, having struggled to nail down a spot in their first XI. The Turkey international joined the Catalan giants from La Liga rivals Atletico Madrid in the summer of 2015 but has found consistent game time hard to come by. Last week, Turan visited former team-mate Diego Costa and spent a day and a half in London. GETTY Arda Turan has been linked with a move away from Barcelona Turan has now bought a home near Stamford Bridge He was pictured with the Chelsea star, and according to Turkish Football , Turan has now bought a home near Stamford Bridge.
